title: The Beverly Hills Hotel logo 50s script
content:
Can anybody tell me if this is a custom font or a font i can purchase?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150130163925im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BHHfont_6511.jpg)
author: guezworks

comments.content: This was [asked before](http://web.archive.org/web/20150130163925/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47054), very recently in fact. I would have to agree with that thread that it is lettering, not a font.

Someone else previously asked the same question [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150130163925/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47054). Please try a quick Google search before posting something for identification in the future. Thanks.

EDIT: Oops, double trouble.
